Product Description

Safe to Use

Plug the light into any outlet or power source to use the fairy lights.There is a button on the plug that you can use to change the lighting mode and turn the light on and off.

Timer Function

The lights will automatically turn on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours.

9 x Fixing nails included

With fixing nails included in the package, you can easily fix the light string to the lawn.

8 Lighting Modes

This Christmas light has 8 lighting modes: Combination, In Waves, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/ Flash, Slow Fade, Twinkle/ Flash, Steady On.

Memory Function

With the memory function, the string light remembers the last mode. If you like the lighting modes which set up last time, and you don’t need to change the mode when turn on the light again.

Perfect Decoration

This is a good helper for Christmas decoration, you can decorate the house, Christmas tree, etc. It is also an excellent gift for your family and friends.

【8 Lighting Modes】：Combination, In Waves, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing/ Flash, Slow Fade, Twinkle/ Flash, Steady On. Press the button on the plug to change to your favorite modes, plug and play.
【IP44 Waterproof】：IP44 waterproof rating Christmas light withstands the weather like rain and snow and can be used outdoors. Note: The plug is not waterproof.
【Safe Guarantee】：UL certified and compatible with most USA standard sockets. It will not overheat even if it works for a long time, safe to touch.
【A Helper for Christmas Decoration】：This Christmas decoration star Icicle Light with a charming lighting effect is a perfect decoration for the Christmas tree, lawn, and courtyard.

Exceptional smart lighting made simple. Turn on, off or dim your favorite shade of white light for everyday use or get the party started with millions of colors. Control and manage your Cree Lighting Connected Max LED Smart Bulbs from anywhere. Control on the app or with your favorite voice assistant. Set up is fast and easy – pair your bulbs quickly using Bluetooth and then control with WiFi. Enable “Follow the Sun” and your lights will gradually shift throughout day to mimic natural sunlight, which can improve your mood, well-being & productivity.
LIGHT TO LIVE, WORK, RELAX AND PLAY – Turn on, off or dim your favorite shade of white light (2200K to 6500K) for everyday use or get the party started with millions of colors
Follow the sun – bring the outdoors inside and automate your lights to gradually shift color throughout the day to mimic natural sunlight, which can improve your mood, well-being and productivity
FAST PAIRING, NO HUB NEEDED – Bluetooth + WiFi makes pairing simple and easy. Guided setup takes you step-by-step to create the perfect smart home for you
VOICE CONTROL – Works with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant devices for complete voice control
CREATE SCENES AND ROUTINES – Set scenes or put your lights on a schedule, whether at home or away

Connected Max A19 60W Smart LED Bulb

By Cree Lighting

Exceptional smart lighting made simple. Turn on, off or dim your favorite shade of white light for everyday use or get the party started with millions of colors. Control and manage your Cree Lighting Connected Max LED Smart Bulbs from anywhere. Control on the app or with your favorite voice assistant. Set up is fast and easy – pair your bulbs quickly using Bluetooth and then control with WiFi. Enable

“Follow the Sun” and your lights will gradually shift throughout day to mimic natural sunlight, which can improve your mood, well-being & productivity.

  • CONNECTS TO ALEXA: Be sure to enable the Cree Lighting smart skills in the Alexa app
  • QUICK START: Check out the QuickStart guide below for more information regarding bulb setup
  • SUPPORT: For additional support, check the back of your bulb box or user instructions on packaging

Read more

Read more

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I use Connected Max bulbs on a 5GHz router?

No, Connected Max bulbs must be paired to a 2.4 GHz WiFi network. If you have a multi-band or mesh router, which supports both a both 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands, you can must connect to the 2.4GHz band. For detailed instructions and more help, download the Connected Max Wireless Router Guide.

What does it mean if my bulb is status is “offline” or the bulb is flashing?

A power outage or router service interruption disconnected the bulb from the network. While the bulbs do not need to have constant power, if the bulb does lose any power for a long duration of time, it might need to be reset. To do that, do not remove the bulb from the app. Just select the plus sign on the main menu in the top right-hand corner of the screen. Add the bulbs with the original steps, and all names and schedules given will remain and bring your bulb back to a functional state

Can I use Connected Max bulbs with a standard wall or lamp dimmer?

No, using with a standard wall or lamp dimmer will cause interference and your bulb will not operate as intended. All Connected Max bulbs are dimmable using the Cree Lighting app or with your connected voice assistant.

Can I turn the Connected Max bulb on or off at the light switch?

No, using a wall or lamp switch to turn off the bulb is not recommended. Turning power off at the switch will make the bulb inoperable in the app or with connected voice assistant. Any schedules or automation will not run as scheduled it power is off at the switch. You may also cause compatibility issues or accidentally reset the bulb by switching on and off at the switch.

Can I use the Connected Max bulbs with a smart switches or plug?

No, since the bulb itself has smart technology built in, there is no need to connect to any other smart switch or plug. You may also cause compatibility issues or accidentally reset the bulb by switching on and off at smart switch or plug.

Can the Connected Max bulbs be used outdoors?

Connected Max PAR38 is designed for use outdoors. Its UL wet rating means it can get wet and exposed directly to weather or water. The rest of the Connected Max family is UL Damp Rated, which means it can be used outdoors in a fixture that is not exposed to weather or water (such as carriage light) as long as they’re protected against weather and water contact. Any bulbs used outdoors need to be within range of your WiFi router. A weak WiFi signal may cause delays or interruptions in your controllability.

4.5
Price: $28.98 - $14.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:58:32 UTC – Details)

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {

setInitialStates(

Product Description

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life

CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.

Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual

*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

*Smooth surface with slide and touch control is easy to turn on/off, adjust color mode or brightness, set timing off.

*CUMKA LED Desk lamp with 50000 hours long lifespan ensure long time useage without changing the LED.

*Adjustable & Foldable desk lamps easy to tilt the head up 225°, arm down 90° and base swivels 160 ° to provide the best lighting angle. Easy fold flat to carry and space saving.

Wide Application Desk Lamps for Home Office School for Reading Studying Working

Various Lighting Modes & Eye-Friendly LEDCUMKA table lamp has 5 color temperatures (from 3000K to 6000K), each with 10 brightness levels,which equals 50 modes, just easily and quickly via sensitive touch sensor switch to adjust. This led lamp is perfect for work,reading and study. Desk lamp with usb charging port has energy-saving full-spectrum LED beads with soft eye protection features to relieve eye fatigue,no flicker,no shadow characteristics,meeting your needs in different environments.
Auto Timer Setting & Memory FunctionCUMKA small desk lamp has 30/60 minutes automatic light off timer, even when you fall asleep under the reading lamp while reading at night, the set time will automatically turn off the light when it’s up, saving power. The led desk lamp also has a memory function that allows you to memorize the color and brightness of the light and adjust it freely, making it easy to store your personal settings for the next use.
Multi-Angle Adjustments & Space SavingThe head of the office desk lamp can be rotated 225°, the arm can be folded 90°, the swivel base can be rotated 160° ，making the lighting more flexible, so it can be adjusted to any lighting angle you need at a large angle. The base of the led desk lamps measure 7×4.3 inches, this office lighting takes up little space on the table, but it can light up a large area. The desk lights are perfect for use in living room, reading room, bedroom, office, etc.
Long Lifespan & After-Sales ServiceCUMKA wireless charging lamp have a lifespan of 50000 hours, never need replace a bulb,40 times longer than a typical incandescent light, reducing energy consumption and saving power, we also provide a power cable for faster and more stable charging. We offer a 12-month warranty, if you have any questions about the desk lamps, please contact us anytime.

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life


  • CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
  • Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
  • Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
  • Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
  • LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.


Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) PEACE OF MIND: Set lights to automatically adjust with seasons so your family always comes back to a well-lit home; enable smart away to randomly turn your lights on/off to look like you’re home even if you’re away (Caséta Smart Hub, L-BDG2-WH, required)MOST CONNECTED: Caséta connects with more leading smart ... item.content:encoded:
Price: $44.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:13:17 UTC – Details)



PEACE OF MIND: Set lights to automatically adjust with seasons so your family always comes back to a well-lit home; enable smart away to randomly turn your lights on/off to look like you’re home even if you’re away (Caséta Smart Hub, L-BDG2-WH, required)
MOST CONNECTED: Caséta connects with more leading smart home devices – including Amazon Alexa, Apple HomeKit, the Google Assistant, Ring, Serena shades and Sonos – than any other smart lighting control brand (Caséta Smart Hub required)
CONTROL YOUR WAY: Caséta puts the smarts in the switch so you can control a variety of ways – via the free Lutron app, your voice or from the switch; schedule lights to change at set times or activate scenes with the touch of a button (Caséta Smart Hub required)
GET MORE, SPEND LESS: One Caséta smart switch can control many bulbs at once; make many bulbs smart, even your existing bulbs; get smart control of multiple styles of dimmable LED, incandescent and halogen bulbs
SMART CONTROL OF PLUG-IN LAMPS: Simply plugs into a standard outlet and can be used with up to 2 floor or table lamps
WIRELESS REMOTE CONTROL: For added convenience, use with wireless Pico remote (PJ2-3BRL-GXX-L01) to turn your lights on, off, or dim and brighten with the touch of a button from anywhere in the home
EASY 3-WAY SETUP: Create a 3-way by mounting Pico to almost any wall surface – no cutting holes or pulling wire, with a wall mount bracket (PICO-WBX-ADAPT sold separately). Replace existing 3-way switches by mounting the bracket and Pico over the backbox

item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:13:44 UTC – Details)



[More Efficient & Safer Light Sensors]-We use a more advanced monocrystalline solar panel and have upgraded its size. It can now receive, store and release solar energy more efficiently, dramatically increasing the solar energy conversion rate, meaning shorter charging times and longer lighting times. All modules are IP65 waterproof, whether it is raining, foggy or snowing can be used outdoors. Usually it can work up to 10-12 hours after 4-6 hours of charging in direct sunlight.
[Variable Lighting Modes to Create Various Ambiance]-The solar starlight light has 8 different lighting modes that can be adjusted by the ‘mode’ button behind the solar panel. And the built-in memory chip with memory function, every time you turn it on or when the night comes, it will automatically adopt the mode set for you last time. You can adjust to the most suitable lighting mode according to the need for decoration or different situations.
[Extra-Long & Widely Used Outdoor/Indoor String Lights]-The solar LED string lights are 66FT long, the spacing of LED beads is 10cm, and the lead length is 6FT, which can be easily installed in the place where decoration is needed. It can be molded into various shapes for gardens, courtyards, trees, porches, roofs, fences bistros, restaurants, hotels, commercial buildings. It can also be used in weddings, parties, Christmas, New Year parties to create a warm, joyful and festive ambiance.
[Be The Most Responsible Seller]-We are committed to provide you with high quality products. If you encounter any problem in the process of using solar string lights, please feel free to contact us, we will provide 7*24 hours technical service, you just need to send an email to the buyer center, we will reply within 8 hours.NOTE: It will automatically charge and light up at night when the switch behind the solar panel is turned on.

【Super Large Projection Area】The upgrade Christmas light projector is designed with two heads, which can cover a larger area than others, its optimal projected area of 215-323ft² with the best projection distance is 16ft-33ft, so it can well cover your house, bedroom, or garden; The clarity of patterns depends on the brightness of the environment
【Waterproof Design & Weather Resistance】The snowflake projector light outdoor features waterproof performance, the light is IP65 waterproof rating and the power adapter is IP44 waterproof rating, which suits for outdoors no matter what weather it is raining or snowing; it can operate normally between -25°C- 32°C, so don’t worry about the hot summer and cold winter; please don’t let it directly soak in a rainstorm
【Easy to set up & Adjustable】 It just takes you a minute or two to install it; our Christmas snowflake projector light comes with a round base and a ground stake, you can put the base on a desk indoors, or you can plug the stake into the ground in your garden, yard, you also can install it on the wall with screws; Equipped with a 360°shaft rotary joint, it is ever so convenient and flexible to adjust the projection place where you want, without dismantling, you can turn it anywhere you want
【Xmas Gift Idea & Xmas Decoration】The Christmas projector outdoor can be given as a special gift to your family, or friends; also it is a great choice to add to the Christmas decoration, suits for Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Valentine’s Day, family gathering, party, theme activity, garden landscape house, bedroom decorations

item.title: Fagomfer Kwumsy D1 PRO Real-time Ambient TV LED Backlight Kit with HDMI 2.0 Sync Box, Immersion Ambient Lighting Strips for 75-90 Inch TV, 15 Lighting Modes/4 HDMI Inputs/Handy Remote Control
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) ⭐Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $209.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:34 UTC – Details)



Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no video format restrictions, supports resolution 4K 60HZ (3860*2140P) input and output, Dolby DTS and other audio output.
Unmatched Color Accuracy: The D1 PRO uses an FPGA-based controller board and applies it to a light bar with ARGB LEDs, each light strip contains 60 ARGB LED beads per meter, ensuring it delivers vivid color reproduction every time. Through advanced AI programming, each LED light bead is intelligently controlled to provide stable, accurate, vivid and zero-lag color effects, which will provide extra light to the room while reducing eye strain when viewing in low light conditions pressure.
Personalization: D1 PRO has 15 light modes to immerse you in a visual wonderland and explore the infinite possibilities of lighting. It also comes with an easy-to-use remote, so you can change the color or brightness of the light whenever you want, depending on your mood or need, providing exciting lighting effects for music, videos and games.
Friendly Design and Easy to Use: We offer different sizes to match any screen from 32 inches to 120 inches, please buy as you need. At the same time, our LED light bar has a protective layer, which can be cut to the length you need along the dotted line according to your personal needs. All you need to do is plug the cable into the HDMI signal box and attach the strip to the back of the TV/Monitor screen to use (we come with the part to attach the LED strip).

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

Merry and Bright

Swipe left to learn more

Committed to creating a comfortable, cozy and festival ambiance for your outdoor & indoor space and life.

We are continually enhancing our product lines to bring you the newest technologies and features available in the marketplace.

We pays attention to not only colorful lighting but also your safety.

Enjoy Decorating Your Home

STRING LIGHTS

WINDOW LIGHTS

ICECICLE LIGHTS

HALLOWEEN LIGHTS

【More Comprehensive Functions】8 Lighting Modes Timer Memory8 options lighting modes make a playful addition to Christmas decor. Build in timer and memory, lights will auto on/off once set, don’t need to operate it manually. Saves your last lighting choice, which is more user friendly!
【Safer and Energy Efficient】High Efficient LED lights will save you money on energy costs, they’ll last longer than incandescent lights and you don’t have to worry about them overheating. Features upgraded 29V low voltage ETL adapter allowing end-to-end linkable up to 2 sets, max 1222 LED 132ft, so you can extend to decorate a greater area easily.
【Superior Weather Resistance】Our led lights use high-quality PVC wire and built with IP44 Weatherproof-Tech so that they can withstand all weather for year-round enjoyment. Please note that the adapter is NOT waterproof, please kindly protect the power adapter from the water!
【Popular Choice & Widely Used】Suitable for both outdoor & indoor Christmas decorations. Suitable for both outdoor & indoor Christmas decorations. White Christmas lights lend a timeless look, and they will give your home a whimsical, snow-covered appearance. More safer to kids and your family while Christmas party, family reunion, wedding party and BBQ outside.



Features

  • High Brightness: Features shatter-resistant acrylic LED bulbs with a concave lens, for a brilliant burst of light that looks great even from a distance.
  • Much Safer: The working voltage for the LED string light is only 29V, which emits extremely low heat. And the circuit board of adapter with short circuit protection puts your safety first. (All passed the UL588 test.)
  • Economic: Only 6 watts per set, saving money on your energy bills while you enjoy the beauty of brilliant Christmas lights.
  • Built to Last: The LEDs are wrapped with milky white sleeve and hot melt adhesive, that seal out moisture for longer life, and a lifespan up to 50000 hours.

These fantastic ice lights perfectly complement other outdoor decorations like Christmas window lights and help to transform your garden (usually at the front) into a festive grotto, especially when teamed with decorations like Outdoor Christmas decorations.

Product Parameters

Light Color: Cool White
Wire color: Clear wire
Number of leds: 611 LED
Number of drop wire: 141 drops
Light Length: 66ft (20m)
Power lead length: 11.5ft (3.5m)

5.5-in spacing between drops, and staggered drop lengths of 23.6 in, 15.7 in and 11.8 in, provide the virtual icy look for your home.


WIDELY USED–The Christmas lights are easy to install on overhangs, awnings, roof edges, windows and other places on your home’s exterior or interior.

Dense evergreen trees, like pines, firs and spruces, may require more lights. By wrapping bushes and shrubs with this ice string lights, you’ll cover a greater area with fewer strands and less work.


Read more




UL LISTED AND QUALITY INSPECTION

Clear wire with 29V UL listed power adapter led string lights create a safe and secure holiday for you and your loved one.

WITH MEMORY FUNCTION

Built-in memory chip, Saves your last lighting mode without you having to remember to reset so every night, which is more user friendly!

END TO END CONNECTABLE

Features upgraded adapter led string lights allowing end-to-end linkable up to 2 sets, 66ft 611 LED per strand, max 1222 LED 132ft. So you can easily light a greater area.

It is suitable for decoration in many scenes, but also suitable as a gift for our family, friends, classmate, lovers and so on.

Product Description

COLOR
Multi Color White Blue Colorful White Red

Super Easy to Install

The car interior lights are pre-installed with optical fibers, which can be directly inserted into the gap of the center console, and the operation is simple.

High Quality LED Strip

Our car led lights are bright, waterproof and anti-collision. High-brightness led strip lights, lighting is more uniform. The colors and light effects are brighter.

Music Sync

The control button of the interior car lights can switch between different lighting modes with one key control. The controller has a built-in high-sensitivity microphone, which allows the interior lights to change with the rhythm of your favorite songs.

Car Decoration

With this interior light, you won’t get bored while driving. The lights of the light bar can dance with the music, as if you are in a fairy tale world, surrounded by “rainbow”, and accompany you through the long road.

Decorate Your Room

Our led strip lights are romantic creators, with soft and gorgeous lighting adding mood. Allows you to relax your mind while staying in your room.

For Family and Friends

The colorful lights of the LED strips create an exclusive party space for you, allowing you to have a party with your family and friends at any time. Create colorful life

【2022 Upgraded Version,Super Easy to Install】：The optical fiber of interior car lights has been pre-installed, and it can be directly inserted into the gap of the center console, and the operation is simple. Car led lights with USB plugs, plug and play, save more time. Suitable for RVs, camping cars, trailers, cars, trucks, SUVs, ATVs, boats, golf carts, etc.
【Sensitive Music Sensor】: The interior car lights system is equipped with a sound sensor to synchronize the car led lights with the music beat. The LED light strips will automatically change with the rhythm of music or sound to enhance your driving pleasure.
【Multiple Modes & 16 Million Colors】: Our car led lights has 3 light flashing modes, rhythm mode, cycle mode and fixed color mode, which can be switched by pressing the remote control button. There are 16 million colors in the luminous car interior lights, and you can adjust the color you like according to your mood or activity.
【2-wire Concealed Design & Safety 】: This led lights for car adopts a convenient, flexible and unique two-in-one design, which makes it easier to hide the thread in the gap, without worrying about exposed wiring or untidy appearance.The interior car lights is DC5v, built-in fuse, with short circuit protection and memory function. It has good waterproof performance and extremely low heat.
【Perfect Gift and Customer Service】: This Led Car Interior Lights are colorful gifts for your friends and familly in holiday season, especially in christams. Theses strip lights are fun accessories for women, men and teens.Our professional customer service team is on call at any time to provide excellent, lightning-fast response to each of your questions.
